about_the_game:
Emiko's Pledge 4 is a 2D platform action game based on the story of a half-demon girl called Emiko, who wants to become the best warrior of the Ettaze state and abroad, as well as protect the weak.


After defeating the Penta Demon Tribe leader, Emiko and her companions of the Tri Demon Girls team initiated their journey in pursuit of the Silver-Haired N.O.W Demon Girls leaders. Suddenly, Emiko got separated from Tri Demon Girls members and fell through the collapsed floor. She ended up in an unknown cave, where she came across Hitomi, the daughter of Majetsu, the Master Healer. After hearing the concerns of Hitomi, Emiko decided to help her get out of the cave safely and escort her to her own village called Iyashino, where Hitomi was supposed to meet her father. 

As soon as they arrived at the village, Hitomi learned from the remaining survivors of the village that her father had been killed by one of the silver-haired N.O.W demon girls leaders. Hitomi broke down and started crying. It came down as a shock for Emiko as well. She could not control her anger, and she vowed to avenge Hitomi's father. While they were in shock, they got attacked by the second leader of the N.O.W demon girls team, Kei, who was responsible for Majetsu's death. One of her demon energy balls struck Emiko, and she was brought down to her knees. Assuming Emiko was dead, she went after Hitomi. Meanwhile, Emiko transforms into a full demon for the very first time and defeats her in a heated battle. After bidding farewell to Hitomi, she went on a journey through the Izanoku valley and Tokuchi cave in order to regroup with the rest of the Tri Demon Girls team. 

You play as Emiko, and your mission is to regroup with the Tri Demon Girls team members. Are you ready to accept the challenge?






  • 16 Stages with stunning visuals!
  • Many enemies with different kinds of 'devil' weapons!
  • 2 Boss Battles with formidable bosses along with 1 Mini Boss battle(Clock Monster)!
  • Lots of deadly traps and obstacles to overcome!
  • 3 Firing modes which include regular, laser and Plasma modes.
  • Ability to freeze the enemies and double jump!
  • Use temporary Shields after transforming into a demon!
  • Story Driven!
  • Anime aesthetic and lots of animated cut-scenes!
  • Join forces with the Tri-Demon girls and work together as a team!
  • Challenging situations and hard to master!



Note: I am a solo game developer and I have done all of the graphics, artwork, character design, animation and programming except for the music. I hope you will enjoy the game.
